visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar area chart with the specified configurations. The chart should have a title, styled axes and labels, and two data series. Additionally, specify custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.

title.text: Polar Area Chart with Stacking and Null Connection

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a polar area chart with specific settings. The chart type is set to 'area' with 'polar' enabled, creating a circular chart. The height of the chart is set to 500 pixels, and a light gray background color is applied. The title of the chart is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18 pixels. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 12 pixels, while the y-axis title is styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 14 pixels. The plot options for the area series include disabling the connection of null values and enabling normal stacking. Two data series are provided, each with a specific color and data points, including null values to demonstrate the effect of the 'connectNulls' setting. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 12 pixels.
